creator: Caron, Joseph Phillipe René Adolphe (Sir), 1843-1908. (author)
Middleton, Frederick Dobson (Sir), 1825-1898. (author)
Canada. Department of Militia and Defence (author)
description: Caron, Joseph Phillipe René Adolphe (Sir): 1843-1908. Dominion Minister of Militia at the time of the Saskatchewan Rebellion, 1885; usually cited as Adolphe Caron (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // Middleton, Frederick Dobson (Sir): 1825-1898. English soldier; commanded Canadian militia, 1884-1890; general in charge of the suppression of the Saskatchewan Rebellion, 1885 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // At head of title: "Department of Militia and Defence of the Dominion of Canada." Report signed: "Adolphe P. Caron, deputy of the minister of militia and defence." Contains General Middleton's report and that of the War Claims Commission. For French version see Peel 1395.
format: xii, 384 p., fold. map, col. plates (part. fold.), fold. facsim.; 25 cm.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Saskatchewan Rebellion
Canada--Military history
Canada--Parliament
Riel Rebellion, 1885
Riel, Rébellion de, 1885
title: Report upon the suppression of the rebellion in the North-West Territories and matters in connection therewith, in 1885: Presented to Parliament
